Class ModulePermissions

  • java.lang.Object

        • sledgehammer.plugin.MongoModule

    Jab

      • createPermissionUser

        public PermissionUser createPermissionUser(java.util.UUID userId)
        Creates a new PermissionUser. If the Unique ID provided is already in use, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        userId - The Unique ID identifier assigned to the PermissionUser.
        Returns:
        Returns a new PermissionUser.

      • deletePermissionUser

        public void deletePermissionUser(PermissionUser permissionUser)
        Deletes a PermissionUser. If the PermissionUser is assigned to a PermissionGroup, it will be removed from the list of members in that group.
        Parameters:
        permissionUser - The PermissionUser to delete. If it is null, IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If the PermissionUser isn't registered properly, a IllegalStateException is thrown.

      • createPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup createPermissionGroup(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a PermissionGroup with a given String name.
        Parameters:
        name - The String name of the PermissionGroup. If this is null, empty, or if the name is already in use, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Returns:
        Returns a new PermissionGroup, if no errors occur during creation.

      • deletePermissionGroup

        public void deletePermissionGroup(PermissionGroup permissionGroup)
        Deletes a PermissionGroup. If the group deleted is the parent of other groups, then the groups are assigned to the parent of the group being deleted. If the group does not have a parent, then the children groups will be unassigned and have no parent.
        Parameters:
        permissionGroup - The PermissionGroup being deleted.

      • getPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup getPermissionGroup(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The String name of the PermissionGroup.
        Returns:
        Returns a PermissionGroup using the given String name, if one exists. If one does not exist, null is returned.

      • sortPermissionNodes

        public static java.util.List<Node> sortPermissionNodes(java.util.List<Node> listNodes)

      • getPermissionUser

        public PermissionUser getPermissionUser(Player player)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player linked to the PermissionUser being retrieved.
        Returns:
        Returns a PermissionUser associated for the given Player, if registered in Permissions as a PermissionsUser.

      • getDefaultPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup getDefaultPermissionGroup()
        Returns:
        Returns the default PermissionGroup instance.

      • getPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup getPermissionGroup(java.util.UUID groupId)
        Parameters:
        groupId - The Unique ID identifier for the PermissionGroup.
        Returns:
        Returns a PermissionGroup if one exists with the Unique ID provided.

      • getLanguagePackage

        public LanguagePackage getLanguagePackage()
        Returns:
        Returns the LanguagePackage for the Permissions Module.
